Gangs of Wasseypur

Rank: 821


A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur- and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.


Director: Anurag Kashyap

Writer: Akhilesh Jaiswal, Anurag Kashyap, Sachin K. Ladia

Stars: Manoj Bajpayee, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tigmanshu Dhulia

Tags: Gangster, Satire, True Crime, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Thriller
